title: Crossbow of Arcane Force
content:
Crossbow of Arcane Force Uncommon 2~11 Damage 1d10 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The soft hum of power emanates from the alien metal. Heavy Crossbow 18m Two-Handed 8.1 130

Crossbow of Arcane Force

1d10 +1 Piercing

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The soft hum of power emanates from the alien metal.

Heavy Crossbow 18m Two-Handed

Crossbow of Arcane Force is one of the Heavy Crossbow Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Cr
